name: Lovleg.p3.no - always show "Notes"
description: Sick and tired of only being able to view the "Notes" on your phone or having to resize the browser window for them to appear? With this plugin enabled, the notes will always be available.
additional_info:
v 1.3.1
Fixed an issue that occured after implementing the 1.3 fix.

v 1.3
Fixed vertical alignment of the "Notes" icon on very wide screens.

v 1.2
p3.no took measures to try to block this plugin. This is now fixed.

v 1.1
Aligned the "back" arrow with the rest of the content. Adjusted som margins.

v 1.0
Added a CSS overwrite to the default function that hides the "Notes" icon on larger screens.
